item.title: Why Bitcoin Is a Scam
item.description: Bitcoin is often seen more as an investment than a currency. People rarely use it for transactions; instead, they buy it with the expectation that others will do the same, driving up its price. This behavior is also common with other cryptocurrencies, which some compare to a Ponzi scheme.
